name: Tumblr - Assassin's Creed Insignia Dashboard Icons
description: Changes text, photo, quote etc icons.
additional_info:
8/30/13 - should all be centered now.

If you want to add it over a Tumblr dashboard skin, download and save the image. The URL can be found in the CSS, it's the media.tumblr URL. Then, go to download the skin you want and if it has the settings to, upload the icon skin from your computer to the style. (This works with Assassin's Creed 3 Tumblr Theme as far as I am aware.)
